experiences.desc: In DSC we want all member to develop and learn together, so as core member we have opportunity to manage the curriculum and teach other member about technology.
As moderator we have opportunity to edit the question in forum, answer the question, and delete spam or out of context question.
BNCC is Bina Nusantara Computer Club, the computer club for Bina Nusantara University's students that learn about web development using Laravel framework
IS Lab Project Member is Information System major's lab that learn about programming, application design, and business technology
